msbt.message: Tee-hee! Back to pick up your sparkler, I see. Don't worry. I kept it safe for you, .
I'm so glad this worked out. I hope you have fun with your own little fireworks show!

Wait a second Your pockets are still full! I guess I misread the situation.That's too bad. I'd really love to give you a sparkler. They're just too much fun! If you do make some room, be sure to come see me. OK?

Your timing is impeccable! I was just about to go looking for you. I have something I think you might want. It's a sparkler! I thought it could be the perfect accessory for tonight's big fireworks show.
Hold that thought. I want to give you my undivided attention.
